title: Setting Up Admin Password
content:
## Why an Admin Password?

The admin password protects your application settings and projector credentials from unauthorized changes.

## Password Requirements

Your password must meet these criteria:
- **At least 8 characters** long
- Contains at least **one uppercase letter** (A-Z)
- Contains at least **one number** (0-9)
- Contains at least **one special character** (!@#$%^&*)

## Steps

1. Enter password in the **Password** field
2. Re-enter the same password in **Confirm Password**
3. Verify strength indicator shows at least Medium
4. Click **Next** to continue

## Important Security Notes

> **âš ï¸ CRITICAL:** Write down this password and store it in a safe place! If you forget it, there is NO recovery option. You will need to reinstall the application and reconfigure everything.

> **Tip:** Consider using a password manager to securely store your admin password.

## Changing Password Later

You can change your admin password from **Settings > Security > Change Admin Password**.
